name: Caroline
greetingText: But I LOVE Calling you Cursed Writer :P
wishText: May your day be as magical and beautiful as the worlds you create. Keep shining brightly, touching lives with your incredible talent and boundless care.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Miss Cursed writer!! Yeee! May all your wishes blah blah...
text2: That's what we were going to do initially.
text4: We realised, We wanted to do something
outroText: Thank you for being a beacon of hope and joy through your remarkable storytelling. Your gift has brought healing and happiness to so many, and for that, we are all profoundly grateful. And This is the small thing I did
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
